org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Class POPStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.POPStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Step

    public class POPStep
extends java.lang.Object
implements Step
    Models the steps of a partial-order plan; implements the Step interface.
    Since:
    1.0
